div.p: The Powers Lake School strives to challenge & encourage all students to become independent lifelong learners, critical thinkers, & effective decision makers who are productive members of society.

Special School Board Meeting w/ Sup. Baesler:
Below is the call in information for this week’s call for board members with State Superintendent Baesler. The call will be held on Wednesday, April 29, at 6 p.m. Central. Remember, because this call is open to all board members and community members.
Microsoft Teams
Join live event (https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_MmVhOTc2YzMtOTYyMC00YWZmLTkxYzgtODhlNDhjNmI1ZWMw%40thread.v2/0?context=%7b%22Tid%22%3a%222dea0464-da51-4a88-bae2-b3db94bc0c54%22%2c%22Oid%22%3a%22484e7a6c-10b5-409c-a926-ae7c58e396df%22%2c%22IsBroadcastMeeting%22%3atrue%7d)

Conference ID: 627 245 450#
